data.name: Junkienator
data.detailed_description:
Junkienator is a game for people who enjoy cleaning. Paper on the floor, bananas on the tables, your work is to clean and nothing more. Seriously, DON'T investigate. Clean up, do your duty, go home, say hello to your mom... and nothing else .

Explore the offices

Who didn't dream about walking around empty offices just to clean up?Look at the number of PCs! How many desks! What about those binders?


Suck and throw objects

No one says that work doesn't need to be fun! Use your tool to throw things in the rooms, it's awesome!
Throw that monitor against the desk, overturn all the filing cabinets, exploit the physics of the game engine, and since you're here get rid of those strange black creatures too. No one will ever complain, at least till tomorrow...

Solve puzzles to enter certain areas

Curse those employees, every time they forget to leave the doors open, how careless! Resolve puzzles to open some doors, reinsert fuses that have fallen to the ground, enter the ventilation ducts if you really need to, nothing can stop you! How careless and dirty are these employees !? What the hell are they doing at work?


Use your innate ability

You are a professional guardian, and as such you have some flair for waste, in every sense! You are so good that you can smell waste even from a great distance! Take advantage of it!





Don't investigate don't investigate don't investigate don't investigate don't investigate don't investigate don't investigate don't investigate don't investigate don't investigate don't investigate don't investigate don't investigate don't investigate don't investigate don't ...

data.short_description: Do you dream to clean offices? This is the right game for you then! In this first person thriller/narrative adventure, you're going to clean all the junk from the damned employees and... that's it. Don't. Investigate.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Italian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 (we're still testing)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This videogame may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Violence, Blood, General Mature Content. Player discretion is advised.
